about_the_game:
Enter the world of Kingdom Wars with an amazing starter pack including everything you need to bypass the grind of the early game and start building an empire with an army of Dwarven Mercenaries and a powerful Dragon under your command.

Start Pack DLC includes:

  • Two extra city slots
  • 20,000 resources
  • Ice Dragon
  • 20 Dwarven Units
  • 24 Hour Attack Protection

15$ value

Kingdom Wars is a free to play 3D MMORTS with real-time siege combat, without the pay to win element so common in the genre.

Kingdom Wars offers lively online world, where players gather resources, construct majestic towns, and impregnable strongholds, direct citizens, complete quests in the service of mighty nobles and fiendish rogues, and eventually manage a global empire. All within an online realm that grows, works, lives, and breathes even when you log off.

name: Kingdom Wars - Starter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows Vista
  • Processor:2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory:3 GB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA GeForce GT 530 / ATI Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:7.5 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX Compatible
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:Internet connection required to play the game. Software installations required (included with the game) include Steam Client, Visual C++ 2008 Redistributable, DirectX and Microsoft .NET 4.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:Windows 7
  • Processor:2.4 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory:6 GB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti / Radeon HD 6790
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:10 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX Compatible
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:Internet connection required to play the game. Software installations required (included with the game) include Steam Client, Visual C++ 2008 Redistributable, DirectX and Microsoft .NET 4.

short_description: Enter the world of Kingdom Wars with an amazing starter pack including everything you need to get your Kingdom off to a great start. From extra resources and city slots to a powerful Ice Dragon, 15$ value. Kingdom Wars is a free to play 3D MMORTS with real-time siege combat, without the pay to win element so common in the genre.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Italian, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
